cu.explanation_en: Setting the integrity algorithm to the unknown enum 'nia9' will cause negotiation failure during the security negotiation phase and NAS registration rejection.

du.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an invalid value 'debug_invalid' will cause the logging system to fail initialization and prevent the DU from starting properly.
du.explanation_zh: 將全域日誌級別設定為無效值 'debug_invalid' 會導致日誌系統初始化失敗，並阻止 DU 正確啟動。
